#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int arr[9][4010];
int sumofdigit(int n) {
	int k=0;
	while(n>0) {
		k += n%10;
		n /= 10;
	}
	return k;
}
int func() {
	int d[4010],size=1,t,i,j,carry,sum,k;
	for(k=0;k<9;k++) {
		d[0] = 1;
		size = 1;
		for(i=1;i<4001;i++) {
			sum = 0;
			carry = 0;
			for(j=0;j<size;j++) {
				t = (d[j]*(k+1)+carry);
				d[j] = t%10;
				carry = t/10;
				sum += d[j];
			}
			if(carry!=0) {
				size++;
				d[size-1] = carry;
				sum+=carry;
			}
			arr[k][i]=sum;
		}
	}
}
int main() {
	int t,a,b,i,ans;
	cin>>t;
	int e=t;
	func();
	while(e--) {
		cin>>a>>b;
		if(b==0) {
			cout<<"Case "<<(t-e)<<": "<<"1"<<endl;
			continue;
		}
		if(a==1) ans=1;
		else ans = arr[a-1][b];
		cout<<"Case "<<(t-e)<<": ";
		cout<<ans<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
